definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
ridgepole/ridgepole and beams/person able to bear heavy responsibility/mainstay (of organization)/pillar (of state)
Goh Chok Tong (1941-), Singapore businessman and politician, prime minister 1990-2004
lit. enough books to make a pack-ox sweat or to fill a house to the rafters (idiom); fig. many books

sentences.english: Have you heard of rocket scientist Sun Jiadong?
sentences.chinese: 你聽說過火箭科學家孫家棟嗎？

sentences.english: The complex consists of 800 buildings with 8886 rooms.
sentences.chinese: 該綜合體由800棟建築和8886間客房組成。

sentences.english: Contact DetailsGuang Zhu Garden Building 1, Unit 5, Nan Ping, Zhuhai (opposite Hua Fa New Town Commercial Street - Janes Bar)
sentences.chinese: 珠海市南屏鎮華髮新城商業街對面廣珠花園1棟5號。

sentences.english: They 've just purchased a new house in the country.
sentences.chinese: 他們剛地鄉下買了棟新房。

sentences.english: The development will consist of 66 dwellings and a number of offices.
sentences.chinese: 新建樓區將由66棟住房和一些辦公用房組成。
這是棟有三角牆的房子。

sentences.english: Ended up adopting two huge villages where we rebuilt 450 houses.
sentences.chinese: 到最後，我們幫助兩個村子重建了450棟房子。

sentences.english: Open Lock button for off-hook and entrance to visitors.
sentences.chinese: 在訪客呼叫通話中，開啓門棟入口鎖。

sentences.english: Stretching some 800 meters, Shangxiajiu is home to some 240 buildings.
sentences.chinese: 長約800米的上下九步行街內則有240棟建築物。

sentences.english: He owns several homes and an airplane.
sentences.chinese: 他還擁有數棟住宅和一架飛機。

sentences.english: Hundreds of thousands of homes and businesses are in the dark and flights are being cancelled.
sentences.chinese: 千千萬萬棟房屋和商業樓處於黑暗中，航班也被取消。

sentences.english: This is a wonderful example of Spanish-style architecture.
sentences.chinese: 這是棟很棒的典型西班牙式建築。

sentences.english: Oh, and we also have a death ray on the roof of building 17.
sentences.chinese: 噢，在我們17棟樓頂上還有死光。

sentences.english: After his speech, he and Korea thin film with Xie Gudong go home together.
sentences.chinese: 演講結束後，他和韓疏影帶着謝家棟一起回家。

sentences.english: I live in Flat 204, Block 5, Daming Estate.
sentences.chinese: 我住在大明物業小區政府棟204房。

sentences.english: It's the third house from the corner.
sentences.chinese: 就是從拐彎處數第三棟房子。

definition: (used in the names of grand buildings such as 百老匯大廈|百老汇大厦 Broadway Mansions (in Shanghai) or 帝國大廈|帝国大厦 Empire State Building etc)
a building of two or more stories/CL:棟|栋[dong4],幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
to build/to construct/to ram/to hit/Taiwan pr. [zhu2]
house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
